data.actual_result: The menu is slightly pushed up being able to see a strip of the bottom
data.expected_result: The menu should pop up as normal with the menu lining up.
data.short_description: Settings menu is higher after split screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your multitasking menu - Put Discord and any other app into split screen mode - Make Discord go back into full screen mode - Go to channel drawer and click the overflow icon
